body_html:
@PhilJd for exampe
input = [[1,2,3], [4,5,6], [7,8,9]]
ids =[[0,0,0],[1,1,1],[2,2,2]]
tf.unsorted_segment_max(input, ids) outputs [3,6,9]
I want to keep dims as the input so that the output can be [[3,3,3],[6,6,6],[9,9,9]]
If it is not clear enough, please tell me.
